00035 void IP_read_byte(void *address,  uint8_t *val)
00036 {
00037  *val = ioread8(address);   
00038  rmb();
00039  #ifdef __DEBUG__
00040  printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: readb(): 0x%x\n", *val);
00041  #endif
00042 }
00047 void IP_read_word(void *address, uint16_t *val)
00048 {
00049  *val = ioread16(address);
00050  rmb();
00051  #ifdef __DEBUG__
00052  printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: readw(): 0x%x\n", *val);
00053  #endif
00054 }
00055 
00060 void IP_write_byte(void *address,  uint8_t val)
00061 {
00062  iowrite8(val,address);
00063  wmb();
00064  #ifdef __DEBUG__
00065  printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: writeb(): 0x%x\n",val);
00066  #endif
00067 }
00068 
00073 void IP_write_word(void *address,  uint16_t val)
00074 {
00075  iowrite16(val,address);
00076  wmb();
00077  #ifdef __DEBUG__
00078  printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: writew(): 0x%x\n",val);
00079  #endif
00080 }

00092 int k_pscip_wait_linkdown(pscip_t *val, int id_pscip, pscip_Dev dev)
00093 { 
00094 
00095  struct timeval cur_tv;
00096  long tv_sec;
00097  uint16_t word;
00098  #ifdef __DEBUG__
00099  printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: k_pscip_wait_linkdown() - beginning \n");
00100  #endif 
00101 
00102  if ((id_pscip >= 0) && (id_pscip < num_pscip))
00103   dev = &pscip_devices[id_pscip];  
00104 
00105 // IMPORTANT
00106  // we read here two timse for the following reason - when reading for the first time after reset the high word indicates "link down" which is not true - i don't know about
00107  // side effects of reading two times - I don't know yet
00108 // IMPORTANT
00109  IP_read_word(dev->pIP_IOspace[val->chan]+PSCIP_FPGA_HIGH, &word);
00110  IP_read_word(dev->pIP_IOspace[val->chan]+PSCIP_FPGA_HIGH, &word);
00111 
00112  if (word & PSCIP_ERRCNT_MSK)  
00113  {
00114   IP_write_word(dev->pIP_IOspace[val->chan]+PSCIP_FPGA_HIGH, PSCIP_ERRCLEAR_MSK | 0x0000);
00115   IP_write_word(dev->pIP_IOspace[val->chan]+PSCIP_FPGA_LOW, 0x0000);       //added by ML, FPGA reacts to writing to the low word, without this line, the counter is not cleared
00116  }
00117    
00118  if (word & PSCIP_LINKDOWN_MSK)
00119  {
00120   do_gettimeofday(&dev->tv[val->chan]);
00121   dev->stats[val->chan].err_flag |= PSCIP_LINKDOWN_MSK;
00122   dev->stats[val->chan].linkdown_cnt++;
00123   #ifdef __DEBUG__
00124   printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: ERROR: PSCIP_LINK_ERR -> PSCIP_LINKDOWN_MSK\n");
00125   #endif 
00126   return -PSCIP_LINK_ERR;
00127 
00128  }
00129  else 
00130  {
00131   do_gettimeofday(&cur_tv);
00132   tv_sec = (cur_tv.tv_sec-dev->tv[val->chan].tv_sec); 
00133   if (tv_sec < PSCIP_LINKDOWN_TOUT) 
00134   {
00135    dev->stats[val->chan].err_flag |= PSCIP_LINKDOWN_MSK;
00136    dev->stats[val->chan].linkdown_cnt++;
00137    #ifdef __DEBUG__
00138    printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: ERROR: PSCIP_LINK_ERR -> PSCIP_LINKDOWN_TOUT\n");
00139    #endif 
00140    return -PSCIP_LINK_ERR;
00141 
00142   } 
00143  } 
00144  
00145  #ifdef __DEBUG__
00146  printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: k_pscip_wait_linkdown() - end \n"); 
00147  #endif 
00148  
00149  return 0;
00150 
00151  
00152 } 
00153 /* end k_pscip_wait_linkdown() */
00154 
00155 
00163 int k_pscip_wrhiprio(pscip_t *val, int id_pscip, pscip_Dev dev) 
00164 {
00165  
00166  uint8_t   byte;
00167  uint16_t   word;
00168  uint32_t   tmp_data = 0;
00169  uint32_t   cnt=0;
00170  int32_t   ret = 0;
00171 
00172  #ifndef RTAI
00173   unsigned long flags;
00174  #endif
00175 
00176  #ifdef __DEBUG__
00177  printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: k_pscip_wrhiprio() - beginning \n"); 
00178  #endif  
00179 
00180  
00181  if ((id_pscip >= 0) && (id_pscip < num_pscip))
00182   dev = &pscip_devices[id_pscip];  
00183 
00184  #ifdef RTAI
00185   rt_sem_wait(&dev->rt_sem[val->chan]);
00186  #endif   
00187 
00188 
00189 
00190  if ((ret = k_pscip_wait_linkdown(val, -1, dev)) < 0)
00191  {
00192   #ifdef __DEBUG__
00193   printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: ERROR: linkdown \n"); 
00194   #endif 
00195   goto error;
00196  }
00197  dev->irqflag[val->chan] = PSCIP_IRQ_REQUEST;
00198  word = (val->stat << 8) | val->address; 
00199  IP_write_word(dev->pIP_IOspace[val->chan]+PSCIP_HPRIOWRITE_REG,word); 
00200  
00201  word = (val->data >> 16) & 0xffff; 
00202  IP_write_word(dev->pIP_IOspace[val->chan]+PSCIP_HPRIOWRITE_DATA, cpu_to_be16(word));
00203  word = val->data & 0xffff; 
00204  IP_write_word(dev->pIP_IOspace[val->chan]+PSCIP_HPRIOWRITE_DATA + 0x2, cpu_to_be16(word));
00205 
00206  #ifndef RTAI
00207   spin_lock_irqsave(&dev->lock[val->chan],flags); 
00208   wait_event_interruptible_timeout(dev->queue[val->chan],queue_flag != 0, 1);
00209   queue_flag = 0;
00210   spin_unlock_irqrestore(&dev->lock[val->chan],flags);
00211  #endif
00212  
00213  while (dev->irqflag[val->chan] != PSCIP_IRQ_SERVED) 
00214  {
00215   udelay(1);
00216   if ((cnt++) > PSCIP_BUSY_TOUT) 
00217   {
00218 
00219    ret = (-PSCIP_TOUT_ERR);
00220    #ifdef __DEBUG__
00221    printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: ERROR: PSCIP_BUSY_TOUT\n"); 
00222    #endif
00223    goto error;
00224   }
00225  }
00226  
00227  if (dev->stats[val->chan].err_flag & PSCIP_ERROR_MSK) 
00228  {   
00229 
00230   #ifdef __DEBUG__
00231    ret = (-PSCIP_TX_ERR);
00232    if (dev->stats[val->chan].err_flag & PSCIP_LINKDOWN_MSK)
00233    {
00234     ret = (- PSCIP_LINK_ERR);
00235     printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: ERROR: PSCIP_ERROR_MSK -> PSCIP_LINK_ERR\n");
00236    }
00237    else
00238     printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: ERROR: PSCIP_ERROR_MSK -> PSCIP_TX_ERR\n"); 
00239   #else
00240    ret = (-PSCIP_TX_ERR);
00241    if (dev->stats[val->chan].err_flag & PSCIP_LINKDOWN_MSK)
00242     ret = (- PSCIP_LINK_ERR);
00243   #endif
00244   goto error;
00245  }  
00246 
00247  if (val->stat & PSCIP_ECHO_MSK) 
00248  {
00249   IP_read_word(dev->pIP_IOspace[val->chan]+PSCIP_HPRIOWRITE_DATA, &word);
00250 
00251   tmp_data = (be16_to_cpu(word) & 0xffff) << 16;
00252   IP_read_word(dev->pIP_IOspace[val->chan]+PSCIP_HPRIOWRITE_DATA+0x2, &word);
00253   tmp_data += (be16_to_cpu(word)& 0xffff);
00254   if (tmp_data != val->data) 
00255   {
00256    ret = (-PSCIP_MISMATCH_ERR);
00257    #ifdef __DEBUG__
00258    printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: ERROR: PSCIP_ERROR_MSK\n"); 
00259    #endif
00260    goto error;
00261   }
00262  } 
00263 
00264 // update controller status
00265  IP_read_byte(dev->pIP_IOspace[val->chan]+PSCIP_HPRIOWRITE_STAT, &byte); //ok
00266  dev->stats[val->chan].cntrl_stat = byte & (PSCIP_INPUTBUF_MSK |
00267   PSCIP_DSP_MSK | PSCIP_REMLOC_MSK | PSCIP_LINK_MSK);    
00268   
00269  dev->stats[val->chan].tx++; 
00270  
00271  dev->irqflag[val->chan] = PSCIP_IRQ_DONE;
00272  #ifdef RTAI
00273   rt_sem_signal(&dev->rt_sem[val->chan]);
00274  #endif 
00275  
00276  #ifdef __DEBUG__
00277  printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: k_pscip_wrhiprio() - end \n"); 
00278  #endif 
00279  return ret;
00280 
00281  error:
00282   dev->irqflag[val->chan] = PSCIP_IRQ_DONE;
00283   #ifdef RTAI
00284    rt_sem_signal(&dev->rt_sem[val->chan]);
00285   #endif
00286   #ifdef __DEBUG__
00287   printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: k_pscip_wrhiprio() - error \n"); 
00288   #endif 
00289  return ret;
00290 
00291  
00292 } 
00293 /* end k_pscip_wrhiprio() */
00294                  
00295 
00303 int k_pscip_write(pscip_t *val, int id_pscip, pscip_Dev dev) 
00304 {
00305 
00306  uint32_t tmp_data = 0;
00307  uint32_t cnt=0;
00308  uint8_t byte;
00309  uint16_t word;
00310  int32_t ret = 0;
00311  #ifndef RTAI
00312   unsigned long flags;
00313  #endif
00314 
00315  #ifdef __DEBUG__
00316  printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: k_pscip_write() - beginning \n"); 
00317  #endif 
00318 
00319  if ((id_pscip >= 0) && (id_pscip < num_pscip))
00320   dev = &pscip_devices[id_pscip];   
00321 
00322  #ifdef RTAI
00323   rt_sem_wait(&dev->rt_sem[val->chan]);
00324  #endif
00325  
00326  if ((ret = k_pscip_wait_linkdown(val, -1, dev)) < 0) 
00327   goto error;
00328  
00329  dev->irqflag[val->chan] = PSCIP_IRQ_REQUEST;
00330  word = (val->stat << 8) | val->address; 
00331  IP_write_word(dev->pIP_IOspace[val->chan]+PSCIP_WRITE_REG,word); 
00332  word = (val->data >> 16) & 0xffff;
00333  IP_write_word(dev->pIP_IOspace[val->chan]+PSCIP_WRITE_DATA, word);
00334 
00335 // set data register 
00336  word = val->data & 0xffff; 
00337  IP_write_word(dev->pIP_IOspace[val->chan]+PSCIP_WRITE_DATA +0x02, word);
00338 
00339 
00340  #ifndef RTAI
00341   spin_lock_irqsave(&dev->lock[val->chan],flags); 
00342 
00343   wait_event_interruptible_timeout(dev->queue[val->chan],queue_flag != 0, 1);
00344   queue_flag = 0;
00345   spin_unlock_irqrestore(&dev->lock[val->chan],flags);
00346  #endif 
00347 
00348  while (dev->irqflag[val->chan] != PSCIP_IRQ_SERVED) 
00349  {
00350   udelay(1);
00351   if ((cnt++) > PSCIP_BUSY_TOUT) 
00352   {
00353    #ifdef __DEBUG__
00354    printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: ERROR: PSCIP_BUSY_TOUT\n"); 
00355    #endif
00356    ret = (-PSCIP_TOUT_ERR);
00357    goto error;
00358 
00359   }
00360  }
00361 
00362  if (dev->stats[val->chan].err_flag & PSCIP_ERROR_MSK) 
00363  {
00364   ret = (-PSCIP_TX_ERR);
00365   if (dev->stats[val->chan].err_flag & PSCIP_LINKDOWN_MSK)
00366    ret = (- PSCIP_LINK_ERR);
00367 
00368   #ifdef __DEBUG__
00369   if (dev->stats[val->chan].err_flag & PSCIP_LINKDOWN_MSK)
00370     printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: ERROR: PSCIP_ERROR_MSK ->PSCIP_LINK_ERR\n");
00371   else
00372    printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: ERROR: PSCIP_ERROR_MSK -> PSCIP_TX_ERR\n"); 
00373   #endif
00374 
00375   goto error;
00376  } 
00377 
00378  if (val->stat & PSCIP_ECHO_MSK) 
00379  {
00380   IP_read_word(dev->pIP_IOspace[val->chan] + PSCIP_WRITE_DATA, &word);
00381   tmp_data = ( word & 0xffff) << 16;
00382   IP_read_word(dev->pIP_IOspace[val->chan] + PSCIP_WRITE_DATA + 0x02, &word);
00383   tmp_data += (word & 0xffff);
00384   if (tmp_data != val->data)
00385   {
00386    #ifdef __DEBUG__
00387    printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: ERROR: PSCIP_MISMATCH_ERR\n"); 
00388    #endif
00389    ret = (-PSCIP_MISMATCH_ERR); 
00390    goto error;
00391   }
00392  } 
00393 
00394 // update controller status 
00395  IP_read_byte(dev->pIP_IOspace[val->chan]+PSCIP_WRITE_STAT,&byte); //ok
00396  dev->stats[val->chan].cntrl_stat = byte & (PSCIP_INPUTBUF_MSK |
00397   PSCIP_DSP_MSK | PSCIP_REMLOC_MSK | PSCIP_LINK_MSK); 
00398 
00399  dev->stats[val->chan].tx++; 
00400  
00401  dev->irqflag[val->chan] = PSCIP_IRQ_DONE;
00402  #ifdef RTAI
00403   rt_sem_signal(&dev->rt_sem[val->chan]);
00404  #endif
00405  #ifdef __DEBUG__
00406  printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: k_pscip_write() - end \n"); 
00407  #endif   
00408  return 0;
00409 
00410  error:
00411   dev->irqflag[val->chan] = PSCIP_IRQ_DONE;
00412   #ifdef RTAI
00413    rt_sem_signal(&dev->rt_sem[val->chan]);
00414   #endif 
00415   #ifdef __DEBUG__
00416   printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: k_pscip_write() - error \n"); 
00417   #endif 
00418  return ret;
00419 
00420 } 
00421 /* end k_pscip_write() */

00423 
00431 int k_pscip_read(pscip_t *val, int id_pscip, pscip_Dev dev) 
00432 {
00433 
00434  uint32_t tmp_data = 0,cnt=0;
00435  int32_t ret = 0;
00436  uint8_t byte;
00437  uint16_t word;
00438 
00439  #ifndef RTAI
00440   unsigned long flags;
00441  #endif
00442  #ifdef __DEBUG__
00443  printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: k_pscip_read() - beginning \n"); 
00444  #endif 
00445 
00446  if ((id_pscip >= 0) && (id_pscip < num_pscip)) 
00447  {
00448   dev = &pscip_devices[id_pscip];  
00449  }
00450 
00451  #ifdef RTAI
00452  rt_sem_wait(&dev->rt_sem[val->chan]);
00453  #endif
00454 
00455  if ((ret = k_pscip_wait_linkdown(val, -1, dev)) < 0)
00456   goto error; 
00457  
00458  dev->irqflag[val->chan] = PSCIP_IRQ_REQUEST; 
00459  
00460 
00461 // set stat register 
00462  word = (val->stat << 8) | val->address; 
00463  IP_write_word(dev->pIP_IOspace[val->chan]+PSCIP_READ_REG,word);
00464  
00465 // write some value just to trigger the packet to be sent 
00466  IP_write_word(dev->pIP_IOspace[val->chan]+PSCIP_READ_DATA + 0x02, 0);
00467 
00468 
00469  #ifndef RTAI
00470   spin_lock_irqsave(&dev->lock[val->chan],flags); 
00471   wait_event_interruptible_timeout(dev->queue[val->chan],queue_flag != 0, 1);
00472   queue_flag = 0;
00473   spin_unlock_irqrestore(&dev->lock[val->chan],flags);
00474  #endif
00475 
00476 
00477  while (dev->irqflag[val->chan] != PSCIP_IRQ_SERVED) 
00478  {
00479   udelay(1);
00480   if ((cnt++) > PSCIP_BUSY_TOUT) 
00481   {
00482    #ifdef __DEBUG__
00483    printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: ERROR: PSCIP_BUSY_TOUT\n"); 
00484    #endif 
00485    ret = (-PSCIP_TOUT_ERR);
00486    goto error;
00487   }
00488  }
00489  
00490 // update controller status 
00491 
00492  IP_read_byte(dev->pIP_IOspace[val->chan] + PSCIP_READ_STAT, &byte);  //ok
00493  if (dev->stats[val->chan].err_flag & PSCIP_ERROR_MSK) 
00494  { 
00495   #ifdef __DEBUG__
00496    ret = (-PSCIP_TX_ERR);
00497    if (dev->stats[val->chan].err_flag & PSCIP_LINKDOWN_MSK)
00498    {
00499     ret = (- PSCIP_LINK_ERR);
00500     printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: ERROR: PSCIP_ERROR_MSK -> PSCIP_LINK_ERR\n"); 
00501    }
00502    else
00503     printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: ERROR: PSCIP_ERROR_MSK - > PSCIP_TX_ERR\n"); 
00504   #else
00505    ret = (-PSCIP_TX_ERR);
00506    if (dev->stats[val->chan].err_flag & PSCIP_LINKDOWN_MSK)
00507     ret = (- PSCIP_LINK_ERR);
00508   #endif 
00509   goto error;
00510  } 
00511  
00512 
00513  IP_read_word(dev->pIP_IOspace[val->chan] + PSCIP_READ_DATA, &word);
00514  tmp_data = (word & 0xffff) << 16;
00515  IP_read_word(dev->pIP_IOspace[val->chan] + PSCIP_READ_DATA + 0x02, &word);
00516  tmp_data += (word  & 0xffff);
00517  
00518  val->data = tmp_data;
00519 
00520 // update controller status 
00521  IP_read_byte(dev->pIP_IOspace[val->chan] + PSCIP_READ_STAT, &byte);  //ok
00522  
00523  IP_read_byte(dev->pIP_IOspace[val->chan] + PSCIP_READ_STAT, &(val->stat));  //ok
00524  IP_read_byte(dev->pIP_IOspace[val->chan] + PSCIP_READ_ADDR, &(val->address));  //ok
00525  
00526  dev->stats[val->chan].cntrl_stat = byte & (PSCIP_INPUTBUF_MSK |
00527   PSCIP_DSP_MSK | PSCIP_REMLOC_MSK | PSCIP_LINK_MSK); 
00528  
00529  dev->stats[val->chan].rx++;
00530  
00531  dev->irqflag[val->chan] = PSCIP_IRQ_DONE;
00532  #ifdef RTAI
00533   rt_sem_signal(&dev->rt_sem[val->chan]);
00534  #endif 
00535  #ifdef __DEBUG__
00536  printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: k_pscip_read() - end \n"); 
00537  #endif   
00538  return 0;
00539 
00540  error:
00541   dev->irqflag[val->chan] = PSCIP_IRQ_DONE;
00542  #ifdef RTAI
00543   rt_sem_signal(&dev->rt_sem[val->chan]);
00544  #endif 
00545  #ifdef __DEBUG__
00546   printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: k_pscip_read() - error \n"); 
00547  #endif
00548  return ret;
00549 
00550 } 
00551 /* end k_pscip_read() */

00553 
00561 int k_pscip_wrwave(pscip_t *val, int id_pscip, pscip_Dev dev) 
00562 {
00563 
00564  uint32_t tmp_data = 0,cnt=0;
00565  int32_t ret = 0;
00566  uint16_t word;
00567  uint8_t byte;
00568 
00569 
00570  #ifndef RTAI
00571   unsigned long flags;
00572  #endif
00573 
00574 
00575  #ifdef __DEBUG__
00576  printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: k_pscip_wrwave() - beginning \n"); 
00577  #endif 
00578  if ((id_pscip >= 0) && (id_pscip < num_pscip))
00579   dev = &pscip_devices[id_pscip];   
00580 
00581  #ifdef RTAI
00582   rt_sem_wait(&dev->rt_sem[val->chan]);
00583  #endif
00584 
00585  if ((ret = k_pscip_wait_linkdown(val, -1, dev)) < 0)
00586   goto error;
00587 
00588  dev->irqflag[val->chan] = PSCIP_IRQ_REQUEST;
00589 
00590 // set stat register 
00591  word = (val->stat << 8) | val->address; 
00592  IP_write_word(dev->pIP_IOspace[val->chan]+PSCIP_WRWAVE_REG,word);
00593 // set data register 
00594  word = (val->data >> 16) & 0xffff;
00595  IP_write_word(dev->pIP_IOspace[val->chan]+PSCIP_WRWAVE_DATA,word);
00596 // set data register 
00597  word = val->data & 0xffff;
00598  IP_write_word(dev->pIP_IOspace[val->chan]+PSCIP_WRWAVE_DATA + 0x2,word);
00599 
00600  #ifndef RTAI
00601   spin_lock_irqsave(&dev->lock[val->chan],flags); 
00602   wait_event_interruptible_timeout(dev->queue[val->chan],queue_flag != 0, 1);
00603   queue_flag = 0;
00604   spin_unlock_irqrestore(&dev->lock[val->chan],flags);
00605  #endif
00606  while (dev->irqflag[val->chan] != PSCIP_IRQ_SERVED)
00607  {
00608   udelay(1);
00609   if ((cnt++) > PSCIP_BUSY_TOUT) 
00610   {
00611    #ifdef __DEBUG__
00612     printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: ERROR: PSCIP_BUSY_TOUT\n"); 
00613    #endif 
00614    ret = (-PSCIP_TOUT_ERR);
00615    goto error;
00616   }
00617  }
00618 
00619  
00620  if (dev->stats[val->chan].err_flag & PSCIP_ERROR_MSK) 
00621  {
00622   #ifdef __DEBUG__
00623 
00624    ret = (-PSCIP_TX_ERR);
00625    if (dev->stats[val->chan].err_flag & PSCIP_LINKDOWN_MSK)
00626    {
00627     ret = (- PSCIP_LINK_ERR);
00628     printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: ERROR: PSCIP_ERROR_MSK -> PSCIP_LINKDOWN_MSK\n");
00629    }
00630    else
00631     printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: ERROR: PSCIP_ERROR_MSK -> PSCIP_TX_ERR\n"); 
00632   #else
00633    ret = (-PSCIP_TX_ERR);
00634    if (dev->stats[val->chan].err_flag & PSCIP_LINKDOWN_MSK)
00635     ret = (- PSCIP_LINK_ERR); 
00636   #endif 
00637   goto error;
00638  } 
00639 
00640  if (val->stat & PSCIP_ECHO_MSK) 
00641  {
00642   IP_read_word(dev->pIP_IOspace[val->chan]+PSCIP_WRWAVE_DATA ,&word);
00643   tmp_data = (word & 0xffff) << 16;
00644   IP_read_word(dev->pIP_IOspace[val->chan]+PSCIP_WRWAVE_DATA + 0x2 ,&word);
00645   tmp_data += (word & 0xffff);
00646   if (tmp_data != val->data)
00647   {
00648    ret = (-PSCIP_MISMATCH_ERR); 
00649    #ifdef __DEBUG__
00650     printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: ERROR: PSCIP_MISMATCH_ERR\n"); 
00651    #endif 
00652    goto error;   
00653   } 
00654  } 
00655 
00656 // update controller status 
00657  IP_read_byte(dev->pIP_IOspace[val->chan]+PSCIP_WRWAVE_STAT ,&byte);  //ok
00658  dev->stats[val->chan].cntrl_stat = byte & (PSCIP_INPUTBUF_MSK |
00659   PSCIP_DSP_MSK | PSCIP_REMLOC_MSK | PSCIP_LINK_MSK); 
00660 
00661  dev->stats[val->chan].tx++; 
00662 
00663  dev->irqflag[val->chan] = PSCIP_IRQ_DONE;
00664  #ifdef RTAI
00665   rt_sem_signal(&dev->rt_sem[val->chan]);
00666  #endif 
00667  #ifdef __DEBUG__
00668   printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: k_pscip_wrwave() - end \n"); 
00669  #endif
00670  return 0;
00671 
00672  error:
00673   dev->irqflag[val->chan] = PSCIP_IRQ_DONE;
00674   #ifdef RTAI
00675    rt_sem_signal(&dev->rt_sem[val->chan]);
00676   #endif 
00677   #ifdef __DEBUG__
00678    printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: k_pscip_wrwave() - error \n"); 
00679   #endif
00680  return ret;
00681 } 
00682 /* end k_pscip_wrwave() */
00683                  
00684 
00693 int k_pscip_rdwave(pscip_t *val, int id_pscip, pscip_Dev dev) 
00694 {
00695 
00696  uint32_t tmp_data = 0,cnt=0;
00697  int32_t ret = 0;
00698  uint16_t word;
00699  uint8_t byte;
00700  
00701 
00702  #ifndef RTAI
00703   unsigned long flags;
00704  #endif
00705 
00706  #ifdef __DEBUG__
00707   printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: k_pscip_rdwave() - beginning \n"); 
00708  #endif
00709  if ((id_pscip >= 0) && (id_pscip < num_pscip))
00710   dev = &pscip_devices[id_pscip];  
00711 
00712  #ifdef RTAI
00713   rt_sem_wait(&dev->rt_sem[val->chan]);
00714  #endif
00715 
00716  if ((ret = k_pscip_wait_linkdown(val, -1, dev)) < 0)
00717   goto error; 
00718 
00719  dev->irqflag[val->chan] = PSCIP_IRQ_REQUEST;
00720   
00721 //set stat register 
00722  word = (val->stat << 8) | val->address; 
00723  IP_write_word(dev->pIP_IOspace[val->chan]+PSCIP_RDWAVE_REG,word);
00724 // write some value just to trigger the packet to be sent 
00725  IP_write_word(dev->pIP_IOspace[val->chan]+PSCIP_RDWAVE_DATA+0x2, 0); 
00726 
00727  #ifndef RTAI
00728   spin_lock_irqsave(&dev->lock[val->chan],flags); 
00729   wait_event_interruptible_timeout(dev->queue[val->chan],queue_flag != 0, 1);
00730   queue_flag = 0;
00731   spin_unlock_irqrestore(&dev->lock[val->chan],flags);
00732  #endif
00733 
00734  while (dev->irqflag[val->chan] != PSCIP_IRQ_SERVED) 
00735  {
00736   udelay(1);
00737   if ((cnt++) > PSCIP_BUSY_TOUT)
00738   {
00739    #ifdef __DEBUG__
00740     printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: ERROR: PSCIP_BUSY_TOUT\n"); 
00741    #endif 
00742    ret = (-PSCIP_TOUT_ERR);
00743    goto error;
00744   }
00745  }
00746  dev->irqflag[val->chan] = 0;
00747  
00748  if (dev->stats[val->chan].err_flag & PSCIP_ERROR_MSK) 
00749  {
00750   ret = (-PSCIP_TX_ERR);
00751   if (dev->stats[val->chan].err_flag & PSCIP_LINKDOWN_MSK)
00752    ret = (- PSCIP_LINK_ERR);
00753   #ifdef __DEBUG__
00754    printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: ERROR: PSCIP_ERROR_MSK\n"); 
00755   #endif
00756   goto error;
00757  } 
00758  
00759 // get data register 
00760  IP_read_word(dev->pIP_IOspace[val->chan]+PSCIP_RDWAVE_DATA, &word);
00761  
00762  tmp_data = (word & 0xffff) << 16;
00763  IP_read_word(dev->pIP_IOspace[val->chan]+PSCIP_RDWAVE_DATA+0x2, &word);
00764  tmp_data += (word & 0xffff); 
00765  val->data = tmp_data; 
00766  
00767 // update controller status 
00768  IP_read_byte(dev->pIP_IOspace[val->chan]+PSCIP_RDWAVE_STAT, &byte);  //ok
00769  dev->stats[val->chan].cntrl_stat = byte & (PSCIP_INPUTBUF_MSK |
00770   PSCIP_DSP_MSK | PSCIP_REMLOC_MSK | PSCIP_LINK_MSK); 
00771 
00772  dev->stats[val->chan].rx++;
00773 
00774  dev->irqflag[val->chan] = PSCIP_IRQ_DONE;
00775  #ifdef RTAI
00776   rt_sem_signal(&dev->rt_sem[val->chan]);
00777  #endif 
00778  #ifdef __DEBUG__
00779   printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: k_pscip_rdwave() - end \n"); 
00780  #endif  
00781  return 0;
00782 
00783  error:
00784   dev->irqflag[val->chan] = PSCIP_IRQ_DONE;
00785   #ifdef RTAI
00786    rt_sem_signal(&dev->rt_sem[val->chan]);
00787   #endif 
00788   #ifdef __DEBUG__
00789    printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: k_pscip_rdwave() - error \n"); 
00790   #endif
00791  return ret;
00792 
00793 }
00794  /* end k_pscip_rdwave() */
00795 
00796 
00803 int k_pscip_rdlinkstat(pscip_t *val, int id_pscip, pscip_Dev dev) 
00804 {
00805 
00806  uint8_t byte;
00807  #ifdef __DEBUG__
00808   printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: k_pscip_rdlinkstat() - beginning \n"); 
00809  #endif 
00810  if ((id_pscip >= 0) && (id_pscip < num_pscip))
00811   dev = &pscip_devices[id_pscip];  
00812   
00813  switch (val->address) {
00814   case PSCIP_WRHPRIO_IDX:
00815    IP_read_byte(dev->pIP_IOspace[val->chan]+PSCIP_HPRIOWRITE_STAT, &byte);  //ok
00816    break;
00817   case PSCIP_WRITE_IDX:
00818    IP_read_byte(dev->pIP_IOspace[val->chan]+PSCIP_WRITE_STAT, &byte); //ok
00819    break;
00820   case PSCIP_READ_IDX:
00821    IP_read_byte(dev->pIP_IOspace[val->chan]+PSCIP_READ_STAT, &byte); //ok
00822    break;
00823   case PSCIP_WRWAVE_IDX:
00824    IP_read_byte(dev->pIP_IOspace[val->chan]+PSCIP_WRWAVE_STAT, &byte);  //ok
00825    break;
00826   case PSCIP_RDWAVE_IDX:
00827    IP_read_byte(dev->pIP_IOspace[val->chan]+PSCIP_RDWAVE_STAT, &byte);  //ok
00828    break;
00829   default:
00830     return (-PSCIP_PARAM_ERR);        
00831  }
00832  
00833  val->data = byte & 0xff;
00834  #ifdef __DEBUG__
00835   printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: k_pscip_rdlinkstat() - end \n"); 
00836  #endif  
00837  return 0;
00838 
00839 }
00840  /* end k_pscip_rdlinkstat() */
00841 
00842 
00849 int k_pscip_rdfpgastat(pscip_fpga_t *val, int id_pscip, pscip_Dev dev) 
00850 {
00851 
00852  uint16_t word;
00853  #ifdef __DEBUG__
00854   printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: k_pscip_rdfpgastat() - beginning \n"); 
00855  #endif
00856  if ((id_pscip >= 0) && (id_pscip < num_pscip))
00857   dev = &pscip_devices[id_pscip];  
00858   
00859  IP_read_word(dev->pIP_IOspace[val->channel]+PSCIP_FPGA_HIGH, &word); 
00860  val->high_data = word;
00861 
00862  IP_read_word(dev->pIP_IOspace[val->channel]+PSCIP_FPGA_MID, &word); 
00863  val->mid_data = word;
00864  
00865  IP_read_word(dev->pIP_IOspace[val->channel]+PSCIP_FPGA_LOW, &word); 
00866  val->low_data = word;
00867  #ifdef __DEBUG__
00868   printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: k_pscip_rdfpgastat() - end \n"); 
00869  #endif 
00870  return 0;
00871 
00872 }
00873  /* end k_pscip_rdfpgastat() */

00884 int k_pscip_rdstatistics(pscip_stats_t *val, int id_pscip, pscip_Dev dev) 
00885 {
00886 
00887  int i;
00888  #ifdef __DEBUG__
00889   printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: k_pscip_rdstatistics() - beginning \n"); 
00890  #endif 
00891  if ((id_pscip >= 0) && (id_pscip < num_pscip))
00892   dev = &pscip_devices[id_pscip];  
00893   
00894  val->rx = dev->stats[val->channel].rx;
00895  val->tx = dev->stats[val->channel].tx;
00896  val->err_flag = dev->stats[val->channel].err_flag;   
00897  
00898  for (i = 0; i < 5; i++)
00899   val->link_err_flag[i] = dev->stats[val->channel].link_err_flag[i];
00900  
00901  val->linkdown_cnt = dev->stats[val->channel].linkdown_cnt;
00902  val->txerr_cnt = dev->stats[val->channel].txerr_cnt;
00903  #ifdef __DEBUG__
00904   printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: k_pscip_rdstatistics() - end \n"); 
00905  #endif  
00906  return 0;
00907 
00908 }
00909  /* end k_pscip_rdstatistics() */

00912 
00919 int k_pscip_reset(int id_pscip, pscip_Dev dev) 
00920 {
00921 
00922  #ifdef __DEBUG__
00923  printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: k_pscip_reset() - beginning \n"); 
00924  #endif 
00925  
00926  if ((id_pscip >= 0) && (id_pscip < num_pscip))
00927   dev = &pscip_devices[id_pscip];  
00928  
00929  if(dev->IPnumber==0)
00930   IP_write_word(dev->pIPinterfaceReg + IP_RESET, 0x01);
00931  else if(dev->IPnumber==1)
00932   IP_write_word(dev->pIPinterfaceReg + IP_RESET, 0x02);
00933  else
00934   return - ENXIO;
00935          
00936  #ifdef __DEBUG__
00937  printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: k_pscip_reset() - end \n"); 
00938  #endif  
00939  return 0; 
00940 }
00941  /*end k_pscip_reset() */
00942  
00951 int k_pscip_clear_err_counter(pscip_t *val, int id_pscip, pscip_Dev dev)
00952 {
00953  #ifdef __DEBUG__
00954  printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: k_pscip_reset() - beginning \n"); 
00955  #endif 
00956  if ((id_pscip >= 0) && (id_pscip < num_pscip))
00957   dev = &pscip_devices[id_pscip];  
00958   
00959  IP_write_byte(dev->pIP_IOspace[val->chan]+PSCIP_FPGA_HIGH, 0x00);
00960  udelay(1000);
00961  IP_write_word(dev->pIP_IOspace[val->chan]+PSCIP_FPGA_HIGH, PSCIP_ERRCLEAR_MSK);
00962  IP_write_word(dev->pIP_IOspace[val->chan]+PSCIP_FPGA_LOW, 0x0000);
00963  return 0;
00964 } 
00974 int k_pscip_dump_all_registers( pscip_t *val, int id_pscip, pscip_Dev dev)
00975 {
00976  int i=0;
00977  int local_address;
00978  int local_chan;
00979  int local_IP;
00980  uint16_t word;
00981  uint16_t word_2;
00982  printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: ==================================================================================\n");
00983  printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: ====================== Local Space 1 =============================================\n");
00984    
00985  for(i=0x00;i < 0x01FF; i=i+0x02)
00986  {
00987   if( i < PSCIP_CHAN_OFFSET) //first link/channel or first IP
00988   {
00989    local_chan = 0;
00990    local_IP = 0;
00991    local_address = i;
00992   }
00993   else if(i <  2 * PSCIP_CHAN_OFFSET) //second link/channel of second IP
00994   {
00995    local_chan = 1;
00996    local_IP = 0;  
00997    local_address = i - PSCIP_CHAN_OFFSET;    
00998   } 
00999   else if(i < PSCIP_IP_OFFSET) //bewteen first and second IP
01000   {
01001    local_chan = -1;
01002    local_IP = 0;  
01003    local_address = 0xff;    
01004   }
01005   else if(i < PSCIP_IP_OFFSET + PSCIP_CHAN_OFFSET) //first link/channle of second IP
01006   {
01007    local_chan = 0;
01008    local_IP = 1; 
01009    local_address = i - PSCIP_IP_OFFSET;     
01010   }
01011   else if(i < PSCIP_IP_OFFSET + 2 * PSCIP_CHAN_OFFSET) //second link/channel of second IP
01012   {
01013    local_chan = 1;
01014    local_IP = 1;      
01015    local_address = i - PSCIP_IP_OFFSET + PSCIP_CHAN_OFFSET;
01016   }
01017   else if(i < 0x1FF) //after second IP
01018   {
01019    local_chan = -1;
01020    local_IP = 1;   
01021    local_address = 0xff;   
01022   }
01023   if(dev->IPnumber) //IO space of second IP is shifted by the offset, so to show entire carrier memory space we need to shif it back
01024    IP_read_word(dev->pIP_IOspace[0] - PSCIP_IP_OFFSET + i, &word);
01025   else      
01026    IP_read_word(dev->pIP_IOspace[0]+i, &word);
01027   printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\tvalue: 0x%4x, local addr: 0x%4x, local chan: %d, local IP: %d ----choosen chan: %d, choosen IP: %d, glob addr: 0x%4x",word,local_address, local_chan, local_IP, val->chan, dev->IPnumber,i);
01028    
01029  }
01030  printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: ==================================================================================\n");
01031  printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: ====================== Local Space 0 =============================================\n");
01032  for(i=0x00;i < 0x0C; i=i+0x02)
01033  {
01034   IP_read_word(dev->pIPinterfaceReg+i, &word);
01035   printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\tvalue: 0x%4x, addr: 0x%4x,  chan: %d, local IP: %d ",word,i, val->chan, dev->IPnumber);
01036  }
01037  printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: ==================================================================================\n");
01038  printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: ====================== PCI configuration Register ================================\n");
01039  for(i=0x00;i < 0x74; i=i+0x04)
01040  {
01041   IP_read_word(dev->pPCIinterfaceReg+i, &word);
01042   IP_read_word(dev->pPCIinterfaceReg+i+2, &word_2);
01043   printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: value: 0x%4x%4x, addr: 0x%4x,  chan: %d, local IP: %d ",word_2,word,i, val->chan, dev->IPnumber);
01044  }
01045 
01046  return 0;
01047 }
01055 int k_irq_enable(pscip_Dev dev)
01056 {
01057  #ifdef __DEBUG__
01058  printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: k_irq_enable() - beginning\n"); 
01059  #endif 
01060  
01061  if(dev->IPnumber == 0)
01062   IP_write_word(dev->pIPinterfaceReg + IP_A_CONTROL, IP_INT0_EN | IP_INT1_EN | 0x0000);
01063  else if(dev->IPnumber ==1)
01064   IP_write_word(dev->pIPinterfaceReg + IP_B_CONTROL, IP_INT0_EN | IP_INT1_EN | 0x0000);
01065  else
01066   return - ENXIO;                     //no such device or address
01067  
01068  #ifdef __DEBUG__
01069  printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: k_irq_enable() - end\n"); 
01070  #endif
01071  
01072   return 0;
01073 }
01079 int k_irq_disable(pscip_Dev dev)
01080 {
01081  #ifdef __DEBUG__
01082  printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: k_irq_disable() - beginningn"); 
01083  #endif
01084  
01085  if(dev->IPnumber == 0)
01086   IP_write_word(dev->pIPinterfaceReg + IP_A_CONTROL, 0x0000);
01087  else if(dev->IPnumber ==1)
01088   IP_write_word(dev->pIPinterfaceReg + IP_B_CONTROL, 0x0000); 
01089  else
01090   return - ENXIO;  //"No such device or address"
01091 
01092  #ifdef __DEBUG__
01093  printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: k_irq_disable() - end\n"); 
01094  #endif
01095  
01096  return 0;
01097 }
01105 int k_if_handle_irq(pscip_Dev dev)
01106 {
01107  uint16_t word = 0 ;
01108  
01109  #ifdef __DEBUG__
01110  printk(KERN_ALERT "\t\t DEBUG_K: k_if_handle_irq() - beginning\n"); 
01111  #endif
01112 
01113  IP_read_word(dev->pIPinterfaceReg + IP_STATUS, &word);
01114 
01115  if(dev->IPnumber == 0 )
01116  {
01117   if(word & IP_INT0_A)
01118    return 0;  //chan 0
01119   else if(word & IP_INT1_A)
01120    return 1;   //chan1
01121  }
01122  else if(dev->IPnumber == 1)
01123  {
01124   if(word & IP_INT0_B)
01125    return 0;  //chan 0
01126   else if(word & IP_INT1_B)
01127    return 1;   //chan1
01128  }
01129  else 
01130   return -1;   //something wrong
01131 
01132  return 0;
01133 }
